title: Vice President Biden to Address the 2009 National Urban League Conference in Chicago | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 29, 2009

 



Vice President Biden to Address the 2009 National Urban League Conference in Chicago







THE WHITE HOUSE

			Office of the Press Secretary
			________________________________________________________________________
			For Immediate Release                                                       July 29, 2009

**MEDIA ADVISORY**

			Vice President Biden to Address the 2009 National Urban League Conference in Chicago


		On Friday morning, July 31, Vice President Joe Biden will address the "2009 National Urban League Conference: The Path to Power," in Chicago, IL. Marc H. Morial, President and CEO of the National Urban League, will introduce Vice President Biden.

		This event is OPEN PRESS, but media must RSVP to Courtney Hill: chill@marketm.com, by 6:00 PM CDT on Thursday, July 30.

		Additional media details are included below.

		Media Details:

		Vice President Biden to deliver remarks at the 2009 National Urban League Conference in Chicago, IL




					Date:

					Friday, July 31, 2009



					 



					Location:

					McCormick Place West, Room W375 D & E
					2301 S. Lake Shore Drive
					Chicago, IL 60616



					 



					Press Entrance:

					Room W375, D & E



					 



					**Press Credential pick-up in Room 470A



					 



					Sat Truck Parking:

					On the dock of F1 Hall



					 



					Press Parking:

					East side of Martin Luther King Drive



					 



					Camera Pre-set:

					Thursday, July 30th, 9:00 PM CDT**



					 



					Press Arrival:

					8:15 AM CDT



					 



					Final Press Access:

					9:15 AM CDT



					 



					Event Begins:

					Vice President Biden speaks at 10:30 AM CDT



					 



					**TV CAMERAS MUST PRE-SET THE NIGHT BEFORE – NO EXCEPTIONS WILL BE MADE**



					 



					Cable Run:

					500 feet



					 



					Throw:

					50 feet



					 



					RSVP:

					This event is OPEN PRESS, but media must RSVP to Courtney Hill: chill@marketm.com by 6:00 PM CDT on Thursday, July 30.




		For logistical questions, please call Kitty Kurth at 312-617-7288.
